title: Emerald Blossom Jhumka - Jadau Kundan Style
features: Inspired by vintage Jadau Kundan jewelry, these jhumkas feature intricate floral patterns set with sparkling CZ stones. A rich simulated emerald is placed at the center of the floral stud, lending an aristocratic touch. Delicate pearls line the base, adding a soft, feminine appeal. The design echoes traditional Telugu temple jewelry (దేవాలయ నమూనా), updated with modern sensibilities. Features detailed flower cut-out work on the jhumka dome.
colors: with a striking emerald green accent and soft pearl white.
occasions: Seemantham (సీమంతం) and other traditional South Indian celebrations. Can also be paired with contemporary outfits for a fusion look at parties or formal events.
description: These Emerald Blossom Jhumkas are a timeless addition to any jewelry collection. The combination of traditional design elements with high-quality simulated gemstones ensures a luxurious look without the high price point of authentic Kundan. The pearls add a touch of grace and sophistication, while the simulated emerald brings a pop of color. These jhumkas are durable, exquisitely crafted, and will add a touch of Telugu cultural heritage to any ensemble.
